extract.name: ex-DW-Payroll Cost FACT Extract
extract.comment: Extracts summary data from Chris21DataWarehouse.dbo.F_PayrollCostFACT table for Payroll Cost cube
extract.query: SELECT PayDate , Version , Region , Store , Currency , EmployeeType , PayrollCostAccounts , sum(Value) as '#Value' FROM Chris21_DWH.dbo.F_PayrollCost WHERE 1=1 and RYear in ((Select ConfigurationValue from DataWarehouse.dbo.SysConfiguration where ConfigurationKey = 'ETLPrevRetailYear') , (Select ConfigurationValue from DataWarehouse.dbo.SysConfiguration where ConfigurationKey = 'ETLCurrRetailYear')) and Store in (select distinct Code from DataWarehouse.dbo.DimProfitCentre where ProfitCentreType in ('CO', 'EC', 'OU', 'RT')) and PayDate not in ('20151130', '20151231') and PayInterval = 'Fortnight' GROUP BY PayDate , Version , Region , Store , Currency , EmployeeType , PayrollCostAccounts

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail Sales Daily (Net Sales - Actual)
ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail Sales Daily (Net Sales - Forecast_MMM)
zz-ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail Sales Daily (Net Sales - Z-Out Forecast_MMM) 20160913
ex-DW-Payroll Cost Forecast Extract
extract.comment: Extracts summary forecast data from Chris21DataWarehouse.dbo.F_PayrollCostFACT table for Payroll Cost cube
extract.query: SELECT PayDate ,Version ,Region ,Store ,Currency ,CASE WHEN EmployeeType = 'Permanent' THEN 'Permanent - Salaried' ELSE EmployeeType END AS EmployeeType ,PayrollCostAccounts ,SUM(Value) AS '#Value' FROM Chris21_DWH.dbo.F_PayrollCost WHERE 1 = 1 AND RYear IN ((SELECT ConfigurationValue FROM DataWarehouse.dbo.SysConfiguration WHERE ConfigurationKey = 'ETLPrevRetailYear') , (SELECT ConfigurationValue FROM DataWarehouse.dbo.SysConfiguration WHERE ConfigurationKey = 'ETLCurrRetailYear') ) AND Store IN (SELECT DISTINCT Code FROM DataWarehouse.dbo.DimProfitCentre WHERE ProfitCentreType IN ('CO', 'EC', 'OU', 'RT')) AND [Version] = 'Forecast' GROUP BY PayDate ,Version ,Region ,Store ,Currency ,EmployeeType ,PayrollCostAccounts

extract.name: ex-Jedox [Cube]: Retail Sales Daily (Net Sales - Target)
ex-DW-Area Manager
extract.comment: Extracts area manger from DimArea manger table
extract.query:
Select CheckSum('MD2',AM.Name) AS [AreaManagerCodeNum] ,AM.Name as [AreaManagerName] From (SELECT DISTINCT DimAreaManager.Name FROM dbo.DimAreaManager LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MatWarehouse ON DimAreaManager.Id = MatWarehouse.AreaManagerId LEFT OUTER JOIN DimBusinessDivision ON MatWarehouse.BusinessDivisionId = DimBusinessDivision.Id WHERE DimAreaManager.IsActive = 1 AND MatWarehouse.BusinessDivisionId != 11 -- Metalicus AND DimAreaManager.Name <> 'Not Assigned' ) AS AM ORDER BY 2
/* Original Query - Replaced 25-May-2017 SELECT DISTINCT -- DimAreaManager.Id AS [AreaManagerId] DimAreaManager.Code AS [Area Manager Code] ,DimAreaManager.Name AS [Area Manager Name] -- ,DimBusinessDivision.Code AS [Business Division] FROM dbo.DimAreaManager LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.MatWarehouse ON DimAreaManager.Id = MatWarehouse.AreaManagerId LEFT OUTER JOIN DimBusinessDivision ON MatWarehouse.BusinessDivisionId = DimBusinessDivision.Id WHERE DimAreaManager.IsActive = 1 AND MatWarehouse.BusinessDivisionId != 11 -- Metalicus ORDER BY 1 */

extract.name: ex-DW-Payroll Cost Budget Extract
extract.comment: Extracts summary forecast data from Chris21DataWarehouse.dbo.F_PayrollCostFACT table for Payroll Cost cube
extract.query: SELECT PayDate , Version , Region , Store , Currency , CASE WHEN EmployeeType = 'Permanent' THEN 'Permanent - Salaried' ELSE EmployeeType END AS EmployeeType , PayrollCostAccounts , sum(Value) as '#Value' FROM Chris21_DWH.dbo.F_PayrollCost WHERE 1=1 and RYear in (Select ConfigurationValue from DataWarehouse.dbo.SysConfiguration where ConfigurationKey = 'ETLBudRetailYear') and Store in (select distinct Code from DataWarehouse.dbo.DimProfitCentre where ProfitCentreType in ('CO', 'EC', 'OU', 'RT')) and [Version] = 'Budget' GROUP BY PayDate , Version , Region , Store , Currency , EmployeeType , PayrollCostAccounts

extract.name: ex-DW PayDates (Add Another Year)
extract.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 'AllPayDates' [AllPayDates], CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) 'PayDate', CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 113) 'DisplayDate', DimDate.RetailPeriod 'RetailPeriodValue', FORMAT(DimDate.RetailWeek, 'WK00') RetailWeek, DimDate.RetailWeek 'RetailWeekValue', DimDate.RetailYear 'RetailYear', DATEDIFF(dd, '19000101', CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), RetailWeekEnd, 112)) + 2 [XLDate],
--CASE -- WHEN DimDate.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN 'RE/BA/YT' -- ELSE 'ME' --END ORIGINAL_PayType,
CASE WHEN RetailWeek % 2 = 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear < 2020 OR DimDate.RetailYear > 2024) THEN 'RE/BA/YT' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 != 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear < 2020 OR DimDate.RetailYear > 2024) THEN 'ME' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 = 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) THEN 'ME' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 != 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) THEN 'RE/BA/YT' END PayType,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(DAY, -14, DimDate.RetailWeekEnd), 112) 'Prior PayDate', CASE WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 1 THEN 'Forecast_000' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 2 THEN 'Forecast_Jul' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 3 THEN 'Forecast_Aug' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 4 THEN 'Forecast_Sep' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 5 THEN 'Forecast_Oct' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 6 THEN 'Forecast_Nov' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 7 THEN 'Forecast_Dec' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 8 THEN 'Forecast_Jan' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 9 THEN 'Forecast_Feb' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 10 THEN 'Forecast_Mar' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 11 THEN 'Forecast_Apr' WHEN DimDate.RetailPeriod = 12 THEN 'Forecast_May' END 'Retail Forecast Version',
--CASE -- WHEN DimDate.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), DimDate.FinancialQuarter) + 'TD' -- ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' QTD' --END ORIGINAL_QTD,
CASE WHEN RetailWeek % 2 = 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear < 2020 OR DimDate.RetailYear > 2024) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), DimDate.FinancialQuarter) + 'TD' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 != 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear < 2020 OR DimDate.RetailYear > 2024) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' QTD' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 = 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' QTD' WHEN RetailWeek % 2 != 0 AND (DimDate.RetailYear BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), DimDate.FinancialQuarter) + 'TD' END QTD,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' YTD' YTD FROM dbo.DimDate DimDate WHERE CalendarDate > '24-Jun-2018' ORDER BY 2
/* ORIGINAL QUERY SELECT DISTINCT 'AllPayDates' [AllPayDates] , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) 'PayDate' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), p.RetailWeekEnd, 113) 'DisplayDate' , p.RetailPeriod 'RetailPeriodValue' , FORMAT(p.RetailWeek,'WK00') RetailWeek , p.RetailWeek 'RetailWeekValue' , p.RetailYear 'RetailYear' , DATEDIFF(dd,'19000101',CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), RetailWeekEnd, 112)) +2 [XLDate] , CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN 'RE/BA/YT' ELSE 'ME' END PayType , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),DATEADD(DAY, -14, p.RetailWeekEnd), 112) 'Prior PayDate' , CASE WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 1 THEN 'Forecast_000' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 2 THEN 'Forecast_Jul' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 3 THEN 'Forecast_Aug' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 4 THEN 'Forecast_Sep' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 5 THEN 'Forecast_Oct' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 6 THEN 'Forecast_Nov' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 7 THEN 'Forecast_Dec' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 8 THEN 'Forecast_Jan' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 9 THEN 'Forecast_Feb' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 10 THEN 'Forecast_Mar' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 11 THEN 'Forecast_Apr' WHEN p.RetailPeriod = 12 THEN 'Forecast_May' END 'Retail Forecast Version' , CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.FinancialQuarter) +'TD' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' QTD' END QTD , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' YTD' YTD FROM dbo.DimDate p WHERE calendardate > '24-Jun-2018' ORDER BY 2 */

extract.name: ex-DW PayDates by Year (Add Another Year)
extract.query: SELECT DISTINCT 'PayDates by Year' Parent , p.RetailYear , CASE WHEN p.RetailPeriod < 5 THEN CAST(p.RetailYear AS VARCHAR(4))+ '_Q1' WHEN p.RetailPeriod > 4 AND p.RetailPeriod < 7 THEN CAST(p.RetailYear AS VARCHAR(4))+ '_Q2' WHEN p.RetailPeriod > 6 AND p.RetailPeriod < 10 THEN CAST(p.RetailYear AS VARCHAR(4))+ '_Q3' WHEN p.RetailPeriod > 9 THEN CAST(p.RetailYear AS VARCHAR(4))+ '_Q4' END YrQtr , CAST(p.RetailYear AS VARCHAR(4))+ '_' + CAST(FORMAT(p.RetailPeriod,'\P00') AS VARCHAR(3)) YrQtrPd , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) 'PayDate' FROM dbo.DimDate p WHERE calendardate > '24-Jun-2018' ORDER BY 2

extract.name: ex-DW PayDates YTD by Year (Add Another Year)
extract.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 'PayDates YTD' LEVEL1 -- ,p.RetailYear ,CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),p.RetailYear) + ' YTD RE/BA/YT' END LEVEL2 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' YTD' LEVEL3 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),Date1.PayDate, 112)LEVEL4 FROM dbo.DimDate p INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT RetailYear ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),RetailWeekEnd, 112)PayDate FROM dbo.DimDate WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND RetailWeek % 2 = 0 ) AS Date1 ON Date1.PayDate <= p.RetailWeekEnd AND Date1.Retailyear = p.RetailYear WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'PayDates YTD' LEVEL1 -- ,p.RetailYear ,CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),p.RetailYear) + ' YTD ME' END LEVEL2 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' YTD' LEVEL3 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),Date1.PayDate, 112)LEVEL4 FROM dbo.DimDate p INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT RetailYear ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),RetailWeekEnd, 112)PayDate FROM dbo.DimDate WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 ) AS Date1 ON Date1.PayDate <= p.RetailWeekEnd AND Date1.Retailyear = p.RetailYear WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND p.RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 ORDER BY 1,2,3

extract.name: ex-DW PayDates QTD by Year (Add Another Year)
extract.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 'PayDates QTD' LEVEL1 -- ,p.RetailYear ,CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),p.RetailYear) + ' QTD RE/BA/YT' END LEVEL2 ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) < 4 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q1TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >3 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) <7 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q2TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >6 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) <10 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q3TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >9 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q4TD' END AS LEVEL3 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),Date1.PayDate, 112)LEVEL4 FROM dbo.DimDate p INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT RetailYear ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),RetailWeekEnd, 112)PayDate FROM dbo.DimDate WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND RetailWeek % 2 = 0 ) AS Date1 ON Date1.PayDate <= p.RetailWeekEnd AND Date1.Retailyear = p.RetailYear WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND p.RetailWeek % 2 = 0
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'PayDates QTD' LEVEL1 -- ,p.RetailYear ,CASE WHEN p.RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),p.RetailYear) + ' QTD ME' END LEVEL2 ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) < 4 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q1TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >3 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) <7 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q2TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >6 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) <10 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q3TD' WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), p.RetailPeriod) >9 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),p.RetailWeekEnd, 112) + ' Q4TD' END AS LEVEL3 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),Date1.PayDate, 112)LEVEL4 FROM dbo.DimDate p INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT RetailYear ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),RetailWeekEnd, 112)PayDate FROM dbo.DimDate WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 ) AS Date1 ON Date1.PayDate <= p.RetailWeekEnd AND Date1.Retailyear = p.RetailYear WHERE calendardate > '30-Jun-2014' AND p.RetailWeek % 2 <> 0 ORDER BY 1,2,3,4

extract.name: ex-DW PayDates by LTM (Add Another Year)
extract.query:
DECLARE @MyCursor CURSOR DECLARE @KeyDate INT, @BaseYear INT, @BasePeriod INT DECLARE @BaseTable TABLE (BasePeriodId INT, BaseYear INT, BasePeriod INT) DECLARE @Result TABLE (KeyDate INT, BasePeriodId INT, BaseYear INT, BasePeriod INT, LTMRetailPeriodId INT, LtmYear INT, LtmPeriod INT)
INSERT INTO @BaseTable SELECT DISTINCT RetailPeriodId,RetailYear, RetailPeriod FROM DimDate
BEGIN SET @MyCursor = CURSOR FOR SELECT BasePeriodId, BaseYear, BasePeriod FROM @BaseTable WHERE BasePeriodId >= 98 OPEN @MyCursor FETCH NEXT FROM @MyCursor INTO @KeyDate, @BaseYear, @BasePeriod WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN INSERT INTO @Result SELECT TOP 12 @KeyDate , '' ,'' ,'' ,BasePeriodId As LtmRetailPeriodId ,BaseYear AS LtmYear ,BasePeriod AS LtmPeriod FROM @BaseTable WHERE BasePeriodId <= @KeyDate ORDER BY BasePeriodId DESC FETCH NEXT FROM @MyCursor INTO @KeyDate, @BaseYear, @BasePeriod END CLOSE @MyCursor DEALLOCATE @MyCursor END
Update ResultTable SET ResultTable.BasePeriodId = ResultTable.KeyDate ,ResultTable.BaseYear = DimDate.RetailYear ,ResultTable.BasePeriod = DimDate.RetailPeriod FROM @Result ResultTable INNER JOIN DimDate on DimDate.RetailPeriodId = ResultTable.KeyDate
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(BaseYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '_LTM' LEVEL1 , CAST(BaseYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '_' + CAST(Format(BasePeriod, '\P00') AS VARCHAR(3)) + '_LTM' LEVEL2 , CAST(LtmYear AS VARCHAR(4)) + '_' + CAST(Format(LtmPeriod, '\P00') AS VARCHAR(3)) LEVEL3 , CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),DimDate.RetailWeekEnd, 112) LEVEL4 FROM @Result ResultTable INNER JOIN DimDate on DimDate.RetailPeriodId = ResultTable.LtmRetailPeriodId ORDER BY LEVEL1,LEVEL2,3 DESC
